messages.content: What is the ComfyUI-PreviewSubselection-Node used for?
The ComfyUI-PreviewSubselection-Node is used for previewing and editing sub-selections within 3D models.
How does the ComfyUI-PreviewSubselection-Node interface look?
The ComfyUI-PreviewSubselection-Node interface features a selection dial that allows users to control the preview of sub-selections within 3D models.
What is the functionality of the selection dial in the ComfyUI-PreviewSubselection-Node?
The selection dial in the ComfyUI-PreviewSubselection-Node allows for precise control over which sub-selections are previewed, making it easier to focus on specific parts of a 3D model.
